sentence.Network_en: Main courses are half price from 12.30pm to 2pm.
sentence.Network_cn: 主菜在中午12点30分到下午两点之间是半价。

sentence.Network_en: By yesterday she was selling off stock at half price.
sentence.Network_cn: 到昨天为止她一直在以半价抛售股票。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 舞台英文术语 ... full price 全价 half price 半价 reservation 定座.
企业介绍之英文术语必备 - 天狼2008 ... · 25% discount 七五折 · half price;50% off 半买半送 · floor/minimum price 底价.

list.abs: half price for joining in now ., 即刻加入可享受半价优惠.
Our drinks are half - priced today ., 我们的饮料今天只收半价.
She bought it half - price during the sale ., 她在大减价时以半价的价格买下了它.

entry.def: If something is half-price, it costs only half what it usually costs.

example.ex: Main courses are half price from 12.30pm to 2pm...
example.tran: 主菜在中午12点30分到下午两点之间是半价。

example.ex: Mind you, a half-price suit still cost $400...
example.tran: 要知道，一套打对价的西服也要400美元。

entry.def: If something is sold at or for half-price, it is sold for only half of what it usually costs.

example.ex: By yesterday she was selling off stock at half price...
example.tran: 到昨天为止她一直在以半价抛售股票。

example.ex: They normally charge three hundred pounds but we got it for half price.
example.tran: 他们通常要价300英镑，但我们按半价买到了。

sentences.sentence: "she bought it half-price during the sale"

auth_sentence.content: Everything I bought in December is now half price.

auth_sentence.content: The second half was all about composure and patience.

auth_sentence.content: The second half of extra time gets under way.
